actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, 5,5'[carobnylbis(imino-4,1-phenylene-2,1-diazenediyl)]bis[8-[2-(4-sulfophenyl)diazenyl]-, sodium salt (1:4).

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, 5,5'[carobnylbis(imino-4,1-phenylene-2,1-diazenediyl)]bis[8-[2-(4-sulfophenyl)diazenyl]-, sodium salt (1:4).

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, 5,5'[carobnylbis(imino-4,1-phenylene-2,1-diazenediyl)]bis[8-[2-(4-sulfophenyl)diazenyl]-, sodium salt (1:4).
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on 2-naphthalenesulfonic acid, 5,5'[carobnylbis(imino-4,1-phenylene-2,1-diazenediyl)]bis[8-[2-(4-sulfophenyl)diazenyl]-, sodium salt (1:4).
